description.narrative: The Project Development Objective is to contribute to improved sustainable landscape management and access to water supply and sanitation services in targeted river basins.

condition.narrative: Section I.A.3 of Schedule 2. Not later than 3 months after the Effective Date, the Borrower shall establish, and thereafter operateand maintain, throughout Project implementation, a committee (the Steering Committee), co-chaired by the Director of the WaterSector Board and the Minister of MEPyD and comprised of representatives of MA, MARENA, INDRHI and INAPA.

Section I.A.4 of Schedule 2. To facilitate the carrying out of Parts 1 and 3 of the Project, the Borrower shall cause INDRHI to,not later than three (3) months after the Effective Date, enter into agreements (“Interinstitutional Agreements”) with each MA,MARENA and INAPA under terms and conditions approved by the Bank.

Section I.A.5 of Schedule 2. Not later than one (1) month after the Effective Date, the Borrower shall cause INDRHI to establish,and thereafter maintain throughout the implementation of the Project, accounting, reporting, and internal control processesacceptable to the Bank, all in accordance with the criteria set forth in the Operational Manual.

Section I.B.1 of Schedule 2. The Borrower shall cause INDRHI to, prior to the carrying out of any Sustainable Landscape ManagementSubproject under Part 1.1 of the Project, enter into an agreement with the eligible Beneficiary (“Sustainable Landscape ManagementSubproject Agreement”), under terms and conditions satisfactory to the Bank.

Section I.B.3 of Schedule 2. Not later than 6 months after the Effective Date, the Borrower shall, and shall cause INDRHI toestablish, and thereafter operate and maintain, throughout Project implementation, the “Evaluation Committee” comprised oftechnical staff of, inter alia, the INDRHI PCIU, MA, and MARENA.

Section I.E.1(b) of Schedule 2. Not later than sixty (60) days after the Effective Date, the Borrower shall cause INDRHI to updateand redisclose the Safeguard Documents in a manner satisfactory to the Bank.

Section I.E.2 of Schedule 2. Prior to carrying out any rehabilitation works or any Project activities that rely on existing damsunder Parts 2.1 of the Project, but not later than 6 months after the Effective Date, the Borrower shall cause INDRHI to: (a)appoint a panel of independent experts (the Panel of Experts) with terms of reference and composition acceptable to the Bank; and(b) convene Panel of Experts meetings periodically during Project implementation, and retaining said Panel of Experts until thecompletion of any dam safety review and/or rehabilitation works.

Section I.E.4 of Schedule 2. Prior to carrying out any rehabilitation works or any Project activities that rely on existing damsunder Parts 2.1 of the Project, and not later than 6 months after the submission of a risk-based dam safety assessment for any ofthe existing dams under Parts 2.1 of the Project, the Borrower shall cause INDRHI to: (i) furnish to the Bank an operation andmaintenance plan, including dam safety monitoring instruments, and an emergency preparedness plan, all for said existing dams underParts 2.1 of the Project and with contents acceptable to the Panel of Experts and to the Bank; (ii) thereafter carry out said plansin accordance with their terms, with due diligence and efficiency, and in a manner acceptable to the Bank; and (iii) carry out anon-site training program for relevant staff of the existing dams under Parts 2.1 of the Project, on the implementation of saidplans.
